pages.text: The $(thing)skills HUD$() is the in-game interface that displays your current skill levels and progress to next level.$(br2)This interface is disabled by default, but can be enabled by setting its keybind in the options menu to any key.
pages.title: Skills HUD

pages.text: Unlike the $(l:aoa3:resources_hud)resources HUD$(/l) interface, this HUD will always render in the top right of the screen, and cannot be moved by config options.$(br)It is affected by the $(thing)disableHudPotionOffset$() config option, however.
